titleStmt.title: An humble address from the people of England to their representatives in Parliament, for an Act against buying and selling of offices.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Croom at the Blew-Ball in Thames-street near Baynards-Castle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
